website_summaries.verdict: Some excitement and a few minor innovations can't prevent most of Call of Duty: Black Ops II from feeling like a retread in need of a reboot.
pros: Branching, "rewindable" campaign makes intelligent use of player choices

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this game a little more than black ops I. I only play solo mode and play against myself. As an older player it helps to keep the mind engaged and active. I did not enjoy the strike force sections. I played the first one then skipped the rest. The play is not to difficult but enough to let me play several times before I get tired of it. I played through the first time in a few days and enjoyed it. I like that you can change your load out at the beginning of each mission. The Zombies I don't know meh.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Never got the game to work. Bought used, and so it seems the A-hole owner previously did not uninstall the game and the registration key is invalid (for whatever reason, take it how you please) Nonetheless i have played the game on XBOX, overall not happy with the overall story line. Also the multiplayer is as bad as everyone complains about with children and trolls. Seems like a downgrade overall to the previous installments. The single player graphics are marginally improved with a faster pace than struggles to keep inline with XBOX hardware performance.
customer_reviews.author: MaysEffect

customer_reviews.title: Two many hackers to be fun!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this could be such a good game! There are to many hackers chopping you to pieces before you get a shot off. Do Not waste you money unless you want to hack God Mode so you can run around and rack up points. I removed it from my computer, its not worth searching for a server without hackers!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great CoD addition
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the series. I had not played Call of Duty since Modern Warfare 2 so this was a nice addition. Story is a great continuation from the original Black Ops and Graphics are top notch. You do have to play it through Steam so create an account if you do not have one but the story line and ability to choose different outcomes throughout the game was a real refresher and not something you see very often in a FPS. Treyarch has always been my favorite CoD developer and there was no shortage of awesomeness from WaW to this from Treyarch. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Novak

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: so, I told myself that after black ops I would find it difficult to really get into another COD game. When COD MW3 came out, I barely played it. I liked it, but it just didn't overtake me like the previous games. I will say that this hasn't been an issue with COD BO2. not only is zombies back (which takes up the majority of my video gaming time) it is awesome, and I really like the new multiplayer as well. Graphics are great, story in campaign is pretty good, although the campaign is pretty short, but let's face it, we don't buy this game for the campaign. did I say how much I love the new zombies mode?
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous Dirk

customer_reviews.title: A lackluster edition to the COD franchise
customer_reviews.text: A diehard COD fan, I am a completest. I didn't want to buy Ghosts until I had this in my collection. I had the game beat in four hours, and the gameplay was very smooth. However, the game almost tries at times to be a "Choose Your Own Adventure" story, with "shoot this person or that person"..."save him, kill him"....but fails at this. It also had one of the weakest endings of a game and the final battle against the villain ends up being the lamest of the COD games, where you only fight his henchmen and not him, who simply gives up without a fight.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Points for the Vendor (Got it quick and happy 4 stars for that reason ONLY), it's the actual gameplay I'm disappointed with...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 4 stars because these reviews can be confusing and hurt the vendor. The vendor got it to me quick and I am happy with that side of the transaction. It's the actual gameplay I'm disappointed with... While the game graphics and story-line rock (typical of certain vendors), WTH on triple monitor support?!?!? I'm sure this game was not created when gamers ONLY had ONE MONITOR? Just an FYI for those Activision folks, "Medal of Honor: WarFighter" supports it OUT-THE-BOX. So, they may want to re-think who they're working with on the Video Card side.
customer_reviews.author: Propeller Head

customer_reviews.title: Really bad movie with occasional FPSing
customer_reviews.text: Just lousy. It's like watching a really bad action movie with maybe Dolph Lofgren.... with some FPS every now and then during the commercial breaks. Way too much bad story with Menendez ALWAYS outsmarting supposedly smart professional soldiers with some just silly plot twists. Really disappointing considering the series. Now I know why ot was $20. I still got ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (BUY NEW COPY!!! IF YOU DONT YOU CANT PLAY ONLINE AND ZOMBIES!
customer_reviews.text: What i expected, buy a new one so you can get the code to play online. Without the code for steam, you can only play campaign and campaign sucks and is worst part of game. With code you can play online zombies and multiplayer. You need to be connected to internet in order to play which is a down side, but at least im not paying to play online. Another thing is that not many people play online too much. An average of 900-1400 people play a day. Although i prefer xbox version(Xbox version average of 40k-60k play a day) , this will do. Updated as of 10/14/2015
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Campaign awfully short!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of the first person shooters. This was a good game, but i found the campaign VERY short (I finished it is roughly 6.5 hours, had a played it in one sitting). In addition, while the graphics were pretty good, there was a GREAT DEAL of theatrics, and I felt that at times, the theatrics far outweighed the gameplay. The online if fun, but its pretty much a "Spray and Pray" environment. All in all, I liked it, but I think the content of the previous iterations of this great series was better.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: OK game
customer_reviews.text: At first this would not install but after Steam updated their software I was able to install. The short time I have been playing this game it is not nearly as good as previous Call of Duty games.
customer_reviews.author: Gary92

customer_reviews.title: Never buy a used games like pc. They won't work like I bought on my other order.
customer_reviews.text: This is just amazing. I'm just shocked that it came in time for me play hardcore and nothing is going to stop this gamer for playing for 3 hours straight. The packaging was amazing and they know me will. They know that I like to retrieve my packs. Thanks Games 4 life for selling just good quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Monster

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, Very Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game to play whenever I'm bored and just feel like playing a game. I would recommend it to anyone who is a fan of the COD series, but doesn't have an XBox console to game on. My only issue with the game, and it's probably more so with my computer, is that it lags horribly and so things move a lot slower than on the console games and it makes it virtually impossibly to accurately aim. Bottom line: I would recommend buying this, but make sure your computer settings are good enough to support it.
customer_reviews.author: The Black Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Fun shooter game
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but no love it. Two main reasons. First, there are limited number of maps unless you want to pay for more, so it gets boring. Second, it is complex keys. You have to use over 50% of your keyboard to use all the functions and features of your character. Granted you can get away with just using a quarter of it and still play, but if you want to be competitive on the public maps, you need all of that. LAME. They are trying to give you all kinds of "cool" and "sweet" options, but is just get cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Why do I do this to myself?
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay version of call of duty. I missed out on Black Ops and Black Ops 2 can be fun at times. The PC version runs will and isn't overly hacked. However, it is Call of Duty so get the AN-94 unlocked, some overpowered perks and never turn back. 3/5 stars compared to other Call of Duty's I have played. I have Modern Warfare, Modern Warfare 2, and Back Ops 2. I also play Battlefield 1942, Battlefield 2, Bad Company 2, Battlefield 3, and Battlefield 4. Many others as well.
customer_reviews.author: Neutron Man

customer_reviews.title: cool game but needs more players
customer_reviews.text: Its good but most players are out of the countries most games run ok but lag is still present and could've definitely used dedicated hosting server lobby, bo1 on pc had it not sure why they cheaped out on the sequel. still worth buying one of the last good cod games on pc since its once of the best cod games to run well on a good pc. I have a gtx760 and I can max this game easily never had frame drops or anything.
customer_reviews.author: SonNYC

customer_reviews.title: Love it, though I'm not your typical CoD player.
customer_reviews.text: I don't care about online multiplayer or the campaign -- I bought it purely for the botmatches. The AI plays the objectives in all game modes, and there are PC mods to make the enemies even smarter without arbitrarily ratcheting up the difficulty. I know I'm the odd case in the CoD universe, but if you don't have a bunch of friends to play with or a lot of time to commit, the botmatches in Black Ops II are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product :)
customer_reviews.text: Game came quickly, installed flawlessly and code worked perfectly in Steam. There are still a good amount of people online and the connections are actually quite good. This was one of my favorite games on the 360, so I bought it for PC. It's nice to have all my previous and current(next) gen games all on one system. I would recommend this to anyone interested in CoD or fps's.
customer_reviews.author: Troy B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it used. It will not work.
customer_reviews.text: The package is deliverd late and there is no activation code to install the game. Useless. Returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Good Game, Lack of Players
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to circumvent Steam's outlandish $60 price tag for this game and I'm glad I did. I purchased this game coming from the Xbox 360 version in hopes of playing Zombies online with max settings. The game delivers. However, there is a very severe lack of online players for this game through Steam. I think the most I saw online at one time was around 900 players and I had lots of trouble finding matches online in Multiplayer and Zombies. Other than that it is a solid game.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Can't play on Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Played Zombies for about a week and then the game crashed and would not load. I tried everything I could think of but it just won't work on my Windows 10 gaming desktop. Steam keeps showing an error saying the servers are too busy and their support is pathetic. If I could I would dump them but unfortunately you're stuck with them if you're a gamer. Activision is no better and I'll try to avoid their games from now on as well. Too bad because I was beginning to enjoy the game but I'm returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Streadwick

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse one of the series that I have played. Graphics way overdone, not enough emphasis on playing the game. Also no solo single mission that I can see. Apparently zombies only if played online. Overall, not very good but considering I just got it much cheaper than when first came out I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Picartist

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Would give ZERO STARS IF POSSIBLE. Bought this for my son and it stated “used and good condition”, little did we know that is was in fact used to the point that the activation code was already redeemed and therefor the product is useless and we are unable to install the game. Do not waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Rip Roaring Good Time
customer_reviews.text: I can see why this game is the most famous Call of Duty game right now. It seems better than Advanced Warfare in a lot of ways. Strangely, even the weapons seem more advanced. The multiplayer is fast and easy but the graphics don't seem to be as strong as they are in the single player. I bought this game in 2015 for $15. I wouldn't recommend paying more as this game is starting to show its age.
customer_reviews.author: B. B. Gibbens

customer_reviews.title: Fix the bug
customer_reviews.text: Thease games don't work thears a bug that they won't fix from steam after you register them
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Graphics aren't noticably better than consoles even though I max out setting on my gaming rig. There are hardly any people online. The only reason I got this was to play zombies with cheats, but I have yet to find cheats that work (my fault). No one plays CoD for the single player so I can't comment on that. I wish I can get my $30 back cause I doubt I'll ever play this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E. Obregon

customer_reviews.title: Quality game!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this game on the PC! The only reason I didn't give this game a 5/5 star rating is because the Campaign mode isn't long enough and the zombie mode seems a bit boring (to each his/her own). However the game play, graphics and multiplayer mode far exceed expectations. I can't stop playing! I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys first person shooter games! Also there is a downside to this game. Like all PC Multiplayer games there are cheaters however that doesn't stop me from having fun!
customer_reviews.author: electronica

customer_reviews.title: Another COD like all the rest
customer_reviews.text: This game isn't bad, let's face it, how many COD's can be played and be called "good?" Apparently, this was good at release and is still heavily played. I don't play COD anymore, it has become too cookie cutter. All that is left to play it is the fanboys and sheep.
customer_reviews.author: toddisit

customer_reviews.title: Worth a play
customer_reviews.text: Standard CoD gameplay. I didn't really care for the story cutting back and forth between future and past. The last Black OPs was set in the past so I would have been happier if the entire game was set in the future instead. Campaign took me around 6 hours which has been longer than the previous installments.
customer_reviews.author: Nicodemus3

customer_reviews.title: Always good game play with COD
customer_reviews.text: I've played this both on Xbox 360 and PC. It plays just as well on either, and the story line is top notch. I do think much of the COD titles are rather typical of each other in many ways for game play. But the story lines are what makes the games in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: sync every frame is on by default
customer_reviews.text: when I first played this game it was very laggy and my fps was at 60 or 30. I thought my video card was to slow. I went into settings and found sync every frame was on. I turned it off and my fps went to 100:)and no more lag when playing the game and no more mouse lag:) also setting up the controls is not easy on this game. But I got most of the problems worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Makela

customer_reviews.title: Played 3 games
customer_reviews.text: Friend convinced me to buy it. "It's more unique than the other CoDs," he says. Play about 3 rounds of multiplayer. It's the same as all of the other CoDs, and just as buggy. It has some weird mouse acceleration too. Single player is a joke. Those horses... I quit after that.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best Post-WaW title
customer_reviews.text: Best Post-WaW tite: why? MW2 had latency issues and hackers. BO1 just didnt really have good maps or loadouts MW3 was latency and hackers times infinity. BO2 seems pretty solid and the near future era brings in A LOT of good maps and loadouts. If you don't want BO2, get either COD4 or WaW. Nuff Said.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McCain

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son for Christmas, first ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas, first of all it arrived late. 2nd of all we need to return the game since the previous owner did not give permission to sell the game. We can not download the game.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the game! Don't love Steam!
customer_reviews.text: I own every Call of Duty game to date and have played them for many hours. It seems that the only real problems I experience all have to do with Steam and there support, or lack thereof! Get off the dime Steam and provide better comprehensive support! Problem after problem should tell you something is wrong with a game that is one of the best out there!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Horner

customer_reviews.title: ITS A VERY NICE PRODUCT... IT CAME AS I SPECTED... I RECOMMENDED... QUALITY 95%... WE ARE USING IT WITH NO TROUBLE AT ALL...
customer_reviews.text: ITS A VERY NICE PRODUCT... IT CAME AS I SPECTED... I RECOMMENDED... QUALITY 95%... WE ARE USING IT WITH NO TROUBLE AT ALL...
customer_reviews.author: ñañon

customer_reviews.title: The War Game out there!
customer_reviews.text: Black Ops 2 is an awesome game with an awesome story line. It is by far the best of the war games on the market. The only downside is that it takes a long time to load on PC. Sometimes you may miss a round when playing Zombies on-line. That can be frustrating at times, but other than that, it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Martiz27

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is brand new nothing wrong with it and the steam code works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lee Haney Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: It's not like Modern Warfare when that came out, like the level were you are a sniper and you'r crawling through the weeds with your buddy and the enemies are walking by but can't see you. I didn't get any of that with this game, wait till the price comes down and get it, it's not all bad.
customer_reviews.author: WaRMaCHiNE

customer_reviews.title: Black Ops 2 PC
customer_reviews.text: I only ever played the multiplayer, and loved every second of it. I've put close to 300 hours into the multiplayer of this game. One of the bigger problems with the CoD games is hackers, but in BO2 I've only seen a hacker a handful of times so they really cracked down on this problem.
customer_reviews.author: David Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Easily one of the best CODs
customer_reviews.text: Great Storyline - I don't normally play campaign, but I found the story somewhat intresting, and didn't feel like a chore when playing it. Great Multiplayer - DSR on PC is unpatched! Everything is somewhat balanced, and the customization is incredible for a COD game! Amazing Zombies - Only reason why I got this game. Zombies on PC is SOOOOOOOOO much better than on consoles. Note: Steam code included
customer_reviews.author: Yura Victoriano

customer_reviews.title: Lag Compensation. Great game runs smooth, but in multiplayer, the lag sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The game runs great on my PC. getting 60 frames per second and higher. But the problem of this game is the lag compensation. Lag Compensation ruins the joy of multiplayer, and it's been very frustrating. Even this problem continues on Call of Duty Ghost. Until Activision learns how to stop being money greedy peoples and fix the game, no more of my money is being put into another Call of Duty title again.
customer_reviews.author: Julio M

customer_reviews.title: Call of Duty Black Ops II does not dissappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a steady fan of Call of Duty games. This one did not disappoint me. The only one thing that seemed to be a bit tedious was the length of a story line or the time spent between playing the game & listening & watching the lead on's. All in all, If you like first party shooters you will enjoy playing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G. Conte

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Black Ops II has a good multi-player game but the single player game has far too much back story taking up time between missions. After a while, it gets boring, sitting through video cut scenes. The zombie maps are fun although I haven't played them as often as the multi-player TDM maps. Overall, the areas that need major improvements are in the spawns, line of sight issues, and eliminating hackers and cheats. The return of dedicated servers would go a long way toward addressing this last issue. Are you listening, Activision?
customer_reviews.author: Ted. A long time Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY USED!!
customer_reviews.text: The product key had already been activated, so what I got was a useless disc. Was pissed I paid for literally nothing. Don't buy used, whatever you do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid game
customer_reviews.text: Still has a good amount of people online, most I've seen here in 2017 was about 2.5k people, it's not hard to find a match for me, in team death match that is.
customer_reviews.author: Shellron Gordon

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: I loved call of duty ghost, so had to check out. glad it had controller support from the start, all other prior game do not unless you do a lot of work in set up. some parts are real difficult and found it best to sprint to next check point to move on and not be stuck
customer_reviews.author: Megan p

customer_reviews.title: Black Ops II
customer_reviews.text: My product will run through the opening dialog every time I begin the game, frustrating. I use the ESC key (actually I have used most keys) and it does not go to the saved games so I can start playing immediately! When I begin playing the game it will not pick up on the hot keys to cause an action so you are stuck at a point in a game and not able to proceed. This has happened several times and I have uninstalled the game and reinstalled it but it does the same thing only at another point in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy a good FPS, not a big fan of multiplayer, but enjoy the campaign. Good game with a surprised ending.
customer_reviews.author: S Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - arrived on time in perfect condition - ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - arrived on time in perfect condition - excellent seller too. Keep up the high quality work, I will return for more.
customer_reviews.author: William Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner (we did order the faster shipping) but installed smoothly and the kiddo loves it
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great game with minor bugs
customer_reviews.text: Great game other than the occasional not letting me shoot because the game is bugging out but other than that great game real classic
customer_reviews.author: deaven michel rought

customer_reviews.title: Steam wanted like 30-40$ for black ops 2 and here I paid ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap black ops 2 game, was given code to download it off steam so I don't use the cd's. Steam wanted like 30-40$ for black ops 2 and here I paid like 15$ so, way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you wanna play the game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the game used and was expecting to be able to play it but when I put the disk in it asked for a code and when I typed the code in it was already used. When you buy a game you expect everything to work and I'm very unsatisfied and now I have to buy another game.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: I Really Liked This Game!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the storyline and the graphics on this game. I've played all the COD games and this one is no exception. It looks like they may be running out of ideas but I still enjoy them. I don't play multiplayer part of the game so I can't comment on that aspect of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: DOPE GAME
customer_reviews.text: I bought it. I play once a day atleast. Runs real good on my PC setup. The most people i scene online at once was only 3500 but who cares I love this game! specially playing it on my big screens in my recording studio! sound s amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Trenton Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I do not like run-and-gun games, I prefer strategic approach that includes vehicles other than the occasional jet. I deleted the game and bought BF4; far better action and includes many elements of FPS games that COD does not.
customer_reviews.author: texasfan

customer_reviews.title: CoD is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only rating it 4 stars. 4 stars because it came in early. But not 5 because it took me a while day just to install the thing due to my bad internet connection. The quality is good and it was never used. so I think I made a good buy. Love CoD.!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Call of Duty Black Ops II
customer_reviews.text: Good game. I just received this in the last few weeks. Just getting to learn how to get around in the game. But as far as I can tell, this is a great game. I've played other Call of Duty Titles. Recommend 14 and up due to graphic blood and violence.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Small

customer_reviews.title: PC games
customer_reviews.text: Great game! A good and challenging sequel to Black Ops one. The maps are complex, intricate, challenging and fun to navigate. The zombie maps are tough but fun as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboybob

customer_reviews.title: Pulled it out like always
customer_reviews.text: Black OPS 2 is another awesome campaign. The thing I always enjoy about Call Of duty games is that the campaign always has a good story line. Although it did lack in graphics against battlefield 3, it offers much more variety as far as multiplayer modes.
customer_reviews.author: fasty buyers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: just punched in the code from steam and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: kain

customer_reviews.title: Good Game Dead Servers
customer_reviews.text: Love the game but for PC i dont recommend the servers are dead for zombies and multiplayer gets super boring running into the same people the only game mode thats kinda alive is team death match and nuketown/hijack 24/7 which is kinda fun but im not a fan of nuketown
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old xbox version, its limited
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know it doesn't come with any zombie maps. Only tranzit
customer_reviews.author: Johnny_Honest

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't exactly my kind of game but is OK for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Just a casual gamer trying to get into it is not a fun experience.
customer_reviews.text: The single player mode is sort of okay, but this is the sort of game to play with a group of friends. Just a casual gamer trying to get into it is not a fun experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Came in a product key, and the key didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better titles in the COD series of first person shooters.
customer_reviews.text: Still killing zombies in this game after a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wieland

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: I'm an SP player and enjoyed this new release. I do play on MP but they need to seperate someone who is say at level 10 from playing against someone who is at level 55. Maybe break levels down by 0-10, 10-20 etc to play against in a match of MP
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: 50% off worth it. Same old song and dance.
customer_reviews.text: This game is much like the rest. I understand the need for higher FPS, but please give me just a little bit of texture. It looks like golden eye 007 on nintendo 64 Leave the smooth lack of texture for the consoles of yesteryear. Lag is hit or miss. When it's good, it's good. When it's bad, it's unplayable. I got the game for 50% off and would feel ripped off if I paid more. I need better servers, Battlefield level graphics and for the PC edition to be treated with the same TLC that consoles receive. I'd recommend this at a discount.
customer_reviews.author: gordon854

customer_reviews.title: Great game...but
customer_reviews.text: Black Ops II like BLI is a showpiece. Great graphics good story line ,etc. While playing the game I felt that they just tried to put too much into it which I felt detracted from the gameplay. That said I am now playing it a second time.
customer_reviews.author: J T.

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok game-lots hacks-weapon are ok/Reminds me COD-Ghost. On ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Ok game-lots hacks-weapon are ok/Reminds me COD-Ghost. On PC version it's a port over from console. Maps on Multiplayer art limited at the mercy of steam-server randomization same maps over/over again.
customer_reviews.author: irishjohnny577

customer_reviews.title: As described, much cheaper to purchase here than online ...
customer_reviews.text: As described, much cheaper to purchase here than online. No need for the disc, but the code was there and had no trouble downloading it!
customer_reviews.author: April B.

customer_reviews.title: The singleplayer campaign is the most fun I've had in FPS campaigns in years
customer_reviews.text: The singleplayer campaign is the most fun I've had in FPS campaigns in years. It's brilliant. I used to avoid Treyarch Call of Duty titles but they've redeemed themselves with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Tech For Less Is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: But they did not include the code and manual to game so it left it useless Tech For Less the minute I called and spoke with the nice cs agent lady she apologized repeatedly and told me it would take couple of weeks to be credited to cc I told her about boys bday and she had it credited back within that same hour and I got to keep the game which was good for a cold one coaster again Tech For Less made a tincy errors but resolve was very very professionally handled
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Less than impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Here I was excited for a newer black ops when in reality its just an updated version of the last one. Nothing really seemed new, and servers were lagging as all heck the times I kept trying to play. Not impressed at all...
customer_reviews.author: MizSeekerz

customer_reviews.title: Great Game.
customer_reviews.text: one of the best cod's thus far. good graphics, overall fair gameplay. Loved the first black ops and this is even better, i just wish they brought the galil back somehow :'( twas my favorite gun.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shoell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: I just got done beating this game on Veteran and am really happy with the way it works with my PC. All I had to do is register an account with Steam (for free), upload the product code, wait for the game to upload to Steam, and I was off to the races. Works perfectly with the Microsoft X-Box 360 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kiddie

customer_reviews.title: fun game
customer_reviews.text: last good call of duty game,zombies is alot of fun with friends and multiplayer overall is very competitive and fun the campaign was my favorite part personally and the story sucks you in
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I have played the earlier games in this franchise (world at war, black ops 1) and at the time they were good but the only thing that has moved on is the graphics. The stories are thin with no interest in them and the Steam wrapper just gets in the way. I don't play multiplayer stuff so I can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: aardvark

customer_reviews.title: Don't feel like you have much control over what's going on
customer_reviews.text: Single player was very formulaic. Don't feel like you have much control over what's going on. Not sure what's going on with the zombies but its kinda fun
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Game is okay, Amazon delivery is great!
customer_reviews.text: This game is dead. No one plays it hardly. The multiplayer for this game is not fun and most of the weapons are pretty unbalanced. Zombies mode is new and it's fun, but not quite the experience you'll get from World at War or the original Black Ops. The campaign is the same, go here, do this, run and gun, etc. Not nothing really new or exciting. Overall, if you like zombies, maybe this game is for you, but expect to play with foreigners and low ranks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: LAG of duty.
customer_reviews.text: I downgraded my review. My internet connection is now better and the lag is worse. I can now longer play this game. I paid for all of the maps and now its just a waste of money. oh well I guess.
customer_reviews.author: KBAR

customer_reviews.title: Call of duty
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. No user code provided for the game.
customer_reviews.author: amy hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Very good series
customer_reviews.text: Catching up on the series but this was as good as the previous. Looking forward to play the next game and would recommend this to those of you that like 1st person shooters.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Game is as described
customer_reviews.text: The product that was mailed to me was exactly as described,a brand new copy of CoD:Black Ops 2 sealed and ready to download onto my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: BLACK OPS II
customer_reviews.text: MY TWO GRANDSONS WENT BERZERK WHEN THEY OPENED THIS PRESENT CHRISTMAS DAY AND I WAS SO HAPPY THAT I GOT THE REACTION I GOT WITH IT! THANKS FOR BEING FAST AND A GOOD BUY!
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Confusing to the point of boredom.
customer_reviews.text: For the single player component it is uninspired gameplay, decent (but not excellent or interesting) graphics and environments, confusing leaps forward and backward through time to try and tell a 'story' that you ultimately will not give a rat's ass about. A couple of the missions were fun and challenging with the new advanced weapons they've imagined, but it was more of a chore to get through than anything else it could have been. This is a game clearly banking on bored kids to buy and play online until Activision shovels out another installment in the franchise. Buy it cheap, play it if you must and then move on to something (anything) better.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Torbett

customer_reviews.title: Like it, don't love it for online
customer_reviews.text: Like it, don't love it for online. Again too many campers and snipers you never see. Campaign Mode was good. Pretty fast paced, hard to just take your time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy Tomb Raider
customer_reviews.text: They should have stopped after Black Ops 1... Not as good as the earlier Call of Duty games, and way to short...:(

customer_reviews.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops II
customer_reviews.text: I can not get it to install on my computer. Activision support is virtually useless as I got a generic email to check their FAQ's, none of which resolved the problem.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game. Great way to take a few hours off.

customer_reviews.text: What more could ask for its black ops great graphics considering I'm able to play this at 60fps on a 9 year old computer I also orders the hard copy because I like to put it on my games shelf

customer_reviews.text: This games run smooth on my pc,and i have a Dell 755...with windows 7

customer_reviews.title: Great story line and game
customer_reviews.text: really appreciate a product that delivers what it promises. I purchase a few products of this type during the year and look forward to enjoying the interaction. This product does exactly that.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent game. Just needed it to add to my collection.

customer_reviews.title: Fast moving action at all times
customer_reviews.text: Great action game with plenty of scenarios you can't get tired of. You should start in the experience mode so as not to familiarize yourself with what's coming next!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Cascio

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: this was the best yet and I cant wait to upgrade my computer so I can play COD Ghost I like all call of duty games and hope there will be more in the coming months
customer_reviews.author: urban ledgend

customer_reviews.title: When it works!
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fine when it works. For some reason steam often times cannot connect to their servers so I can not play the game often.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Horrible load times.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using an Hp Envy Spectre XT and it takes at LEAST 10 minutes to load a map and it ONLY happens on Black Ops II, I play MW3 flawlessly on 720p and with Black Ops 2 I can't even TRY to do that I've only managed to get in one MP game without being disconnected! Single Player same problem just can't get DCed
customer_reviews.author: stuff guy

product_meta.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops II - PC
product_meta.description:
Pushing the boundaries of what fans have come to expect from the record-setting entertainment franchise, Call of Duty: Black Ops II propels players into a near future, 21st Century Cold War, where technology and weapons have converged to create a new generation of warfare.

Call of Duty: Black Ops II Gamescom Accolades


 * "The most ambitious Call of Duty to date" - USA Today
 * "Poised to blow you away" - G4
 * "Treyarch has just vaulted Black Ops II to a new level" - Joystiq
 * "Black Ops II is changing multiplayer. A lot." - Kotaku
 * "A bold departure" - IGN
 * "A whole new level of competitive gaming" - MTV
 * "Brilliant visuals and adrenaline-inducing gameplay" - Forbes
 * "Best of Gamescom" - Gamespot



AMAZON.COM


Call of Duty: Black Ops II is a First-Person Shooter (FPS) that revolves around unique gamepaly that propels the Call of Duty franchise into a world of future warfare, and back again to the modern era. The game is a sequel to the 2010 release, Call of Duty: Black Ops, and features returning Black Ops characters Sgt. Frank Woods and Agent Alex Mason, joined by a wealth of new characters. Additional features include: two distinct yet linked playable time periods, advanced weaponry, branching storylines created by player choices in Strike Force missions, exciting multiplayer options, and more.

A whole new future war Call of Duty scenario affected by player decisions in mission play.
View larger TO UNDERSTAND THE FUTURE, YOU MUST UNDERSTAND THE PAST
Pushing the boundaries of what fans have come to expect from the record-setting entertainment franchise, Call of Duty: Black Ops II propels players into a near future, 21st Century Cold War, where technology and weapons have converged to create a new generation of warfare between old and new foes. In this conflict, the mechanized creations of men reign supreme, facing off against each other as their creators stay safe and unconflicted, and in the process grow ever softer. In this scenario an important question will be asked: What happens when enemy steals the keys? To understand such a possible future, you must understand where you have been.

Players of Call of Duty: Black Ops II gain an understanding of this and more through the game's additional timeline set in the late Cold War era of the 1980's. Within the campaign story, which spans these two eras, players will see familiar faces such as Alex Mason, his son David Mason, and Sgt. Frank Woods. Linking these together will be the rise of another player in the conflict, Raul Menendez.

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * An all-new Call of Duty: Black Ops storyline featuring new characters and and returning characters
 * A unique single-player campaign that contains two time periods linked by characters and their actions
 * Special Strike Force missions, in which the players action affect the outcome of gameplay and the overall campaign
 * A variety of multiplayer modes and play options

ZOMBIES


The Biggest Zombies Experience to Date: Call of Duty: Black Ops II Zombies features three different ways to survive the zombie apocalypse. Unravel the mysteries of a dying Earth in Tranzit, fight endless waves of zombies in Survival mode, or compete in the new 4z4 last-human-standing mode, Grief.

Tranzit
1-4 player co-op in a large open world with a variety of locations. The new Buildables gameplay elements help players move through each area to find the key tidbits that reveal why they are there and what they must do to survive. All the while, public transportation is still operational, as a bus will regularly stop at each location. Zombies ride for free.

Survival
Recreating the classic mode of just purely surviving the shambling, incoming Zombie horde, Survival mode allows you to play 1-4 players co-op in specific locations from the much larger Tranzit area.

Grief
You and friends can take on up to 4 people in a team vs. Zombies vs. team scenario. 2-8 players are thrown in a situation to be the last humans standing.

MP Technology with Zombies: Call of Duty: Black Ops II features new and extensive stat tracking as well as leaderboards for bragging rights. New skill-based matchmaking system will allow players of the same ability to take on the horrors of the night in public game modes. For players that are looking for an extra challenge, Zombies features custom games: Headshots only, higher starting rounds, and toggling of extra items are all available.

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS
Returning Black Ops characters.
View larger Startling future weaponry.
View larger A variety of multiplayer options.
View larger

Unique single-player campaign that contains two time periods linked by characters and their actions
Special Strike Force missions, in which the players action affect the outcome of gameplay and the overall campaign
Variety of multiplayer modes and play options
